meanings: (목숨을) kill, take sb's life, (살해하다) murder, (informal) knock sb off, (신문·문학 용어) slay, (학살하다) slaughter, butcher, ...
Verb bring down, make something blunt

vlive.korean: 일부러 마피아를... - 그럼 얘를 죽이고... So he is chosen as mafia. - Then, kill him... 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “환상의 대똥촉파티(Feat. 마피아게임)” (갓세븐 : GOT7)
vlive.english: So he is chosen as mafia. - Then, kill him...

vlive.korean: 갑자기 넌 왜 날 죽이고 싶어해? - 언니! Why do you want to kill me? - Unnie! 듣기 View video GFRIEND : M6😁
vlive.english: Why do you want to kill me? - Unnie!

vlive.korean: 너는 은하 안 죽이고 싶어? - 왜 나야? You don't want to kill Eunha? - Why me? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : M6😁
vlive.english: You don't want to kill Eunha? - Why me?

vlive.korean: 진짜 아니야! - 그럼 언니 누구 죽이고 싶어요? I'm really not it! - Then who do you want to kill? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : M6😁
vlive.english: I'm really not it! - Then who do you want to kill?

vlive.korean: 사람들 꼭 다 찢어 죽이고 슬프고 난해한 작품은 작품이랍니까? Is it only meaningful if someone dies in it? Or if it's sad and difficult to understand? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 자존감 낮은 남녀가 꼭 봐야하는 영상 [한입만 시즌1 요약 - 수지 편]
vlive.english: Is it only meaningful if someone dies in it? Or if it's sad and difficult to understand?

examples.korean: Our immune systems are killing billions of germs right now. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리의 면역 체계는 지금 이 순간에도 엄청난 양의 세균들을 죽이고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our immune systems are killing billions of germs right now. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He held his breath while the results were read out. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 결과가 발표되는 동안 그는 숨을 죽이고 기다렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He held his breath while the results were read out. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We waited with bated breath for the winner to be announced. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 우승자가 발표되기를 숨을 죽이고 기다렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We waited with bated breath for the winner to be announced. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s time to swallow your pride and ask for your job back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 자존심을 죽이고 일자리를 다시 달라고 부탁해야 할 때이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s time to swallow your pride and ask for your job back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Wilfing and snacking was his daily routines. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 웹 서핑으로 시간을 죽이고 군것질하는 것은 그의 일과였다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Wilfing and snacking was his daily routines. Add to Wordbook
